Name: Alchemy EXP
Description: The inspiration and experience gained by the Alchemy Class at work, accumulated over time, can enhance the Alchemy level and gradually Master - 1ts various skills.
Description$english: The inspiration and experience gained by the Alchemy Class at work, accumulated over time, can enhance the Alchemy level and gradually Master - 1ts various skills.
Description2$english: "Whatever is in reason was first in experience."
